Build Robots. All Week Long.
Robotics Summer Camp at Canyon Crest Academy is the ultimate week-long summer STEM experience for elementary and middle school students.
Learn More

What Camp Offers

At Robotics Summer Camp at Canyon Crest Academy, students start on a journey that can continue for the rest of their livesâ€”and it goes way further than just technical know-how. Campers develop skills in teamwork, collaboration, planning, and creative problem solving, as well as friendships and memories that last a lifetime.
Hover over the pictures below to learn more about what makes our camp unique.

Engaging Challenges and Exciting Competition.

Students build and program robots to complete interesting and complex challenges. Then, they design their own robots to compete against their fellow campers, enabling them to learn new perspectives and problem solving.
Click to learn more...

Experiences with Real Robots.

Throughout the course of the week, students work directly with the same robotics systems used by middle and high schoolers around the world in global robotics competitions.
Click to learn more...

Help when they need it. Freedom when they don't.

Our four-to-one student to counselor ratio that ensures that whenever campers need help with a challenge, they can get immediate, personal access to advice, assistance, and expertise.
Click to learn more...

More Than Just Robots.

We're so much more than your average robotics camp. We have loads of recreational activities, such as Dodgeball and Ultimate Frisbee. Also, snacks and lunch are included.
Click to learn more...

Programs

Each week, we offer each of three levels of camp to cater to all students in first grade through eighth grade.

Elementary

for 1st-4th graders
Campers learn the fundamentals of physics and basic engineering principles through building with VEX IQ robotics kits.
Learn More

Middle

for 5th & 6th graders
Using VEX IQ robotics kits, campers design, build, and program robots to complete complex challenges, as well as compete in an exciting mini robotics competition against their fellow campers.
Learn More

Upper

for 7th & 8th graders
Spend all week building using TETRIX robot sets while learning to program in a text-based programming language. Itâ€™s going to be awesome.
Learn More
